      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      cz.vutbr.web.css.MediaSpec asMediaSpec()
      The medium as a jStyleParser MediaSpec object, used by JStyleParserCssCascader for passing to CSSFactory.getUsedStyles(org.w3c.dom.Document, java.net.URL, cz.vutbr.web.css.MediaSpec, cz.vutbr.web.csskit.antlr.CSSSourceReader, cz.vutbr.web.css.StyleSheet) and Analyzer.evaluateDOM(org.w3c.dom.Document, cz.vutbr.web.css.MediaSpec, boolean).

      The height of the rendering surface, null if undetermined or not applicable.

      The width of the rendering surface, or null if undetermined or not applicable.

      Get the value of the specified non-standard feature of the target medium, or null if undetermined.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Medium

        protected Medium(Medium.Type type,
                 Dimension width,
                 Dimension height,
                 Dimension deviceWidth,
                 Dimension deviceHeight,
                 Map<String,Object> otherFeatures,
                 Medium.MediumBuilder parser)
        Parameters:
        otherFeatures - can be used to pass additional features of the target medium. Must not include any known features. It is recommended that non-standard features are vendor prefixed.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public final Medium.Type getType()
        The media type: "embossed", "braille", "speech", "screen" or "print", or null if undetermined.
